title: Italian Calzones
ingredients: ['7g dried active yeast', '235ml warm water', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '300g plain flour, divided', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '125g ricotta cheese', '170g shredded Cheddar cheese', '115g pepperoni, diced', '35g sliced fresh mushrooms', '1 tablespoon dried basil or freshly chopped basil leaves', '1 egg, beaten']
